subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: A magnetic resonance imaging test on midfielder Claudio Reyna's injured right hamstring, which he strained during an exhibition game in Nashville on Tuesday, revealed no muscle damage, a spokesman for the U.S. national team said.
snippet: A magnetic resonance imaging test on midfielder Claudio Reyna's injured right hamstring, which he strained during an exhibition game in Nashville on Tuesday, revealed no muscle damage, a spokesman for the U.S. national team said.
